title: Pres. elect. rules, outcomes in course countries

content.description:
Compare the rules for picking winners of presidential elections of two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

In your response, you should do the following.

Describe why countries have electoral rules for presidents.

Describe two different presidential electoral rules that are important in determining election outcomes in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries.

Explain how different election rules serve political objectives for each of the two AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries described in (b).
